txt.en: The Dáinlik can be found in the Ironfold.\n\nYou should investigate the base of the Dáinlik.
Investigate the base of the Dáinlik
Workers at the Dáinlik have seen shadowy things in the hills.
'So there was something there?! I knew that we were not going mad!\n\n'You must tell Náin of what you saw! How are we to complete the Dáinlik with these beasts lurking in the rock?!'

'It is difficult to work and to stay on schedule here at the Dáinlik. Each day I hear reports from my workers that they feel as if they are being watched. Some even speak of shadowy thing in the hills. I myself, thought I saw something today, at the base of the axe. Perhaps that would be as good a place as any to start. You must get to the bottom of this!'
This is not a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> out over the Dáinlik
Nothing seems odd below, perhaps a closer inspection of the Dáinlik's base is in order
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> out over the Dáinlik
A shadowy creature attacks from a small crevasse at the base of the axe!
The strange creature has been defeated
Rísti Graver can be found atop of the Dáinlik.\n\nYou should talk to Rísti Graver.
The Dáinlik can be found in the Ironfold.\n\nYou should look out over the top of the Dáinlik.
